description: A Kotlin Android Fragment class named OrdersFragment that displays a list of past orders using a RecyclerView and an OrdersAdapter, with data provided by an OrdersViewModel.

classes.name: OrdersFragment
classes.description: An Android Fragment that displays past orders in a RecyclerView, managing its data through OrdersViewModel.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment layout from XML.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Sets up the RecyclerView with an OrdersAdapter and observes the orders data from the ViewModel to update the list.
